page.title: 08MANTLE ST WELLINGTON
page.content: As you go down the slight incline into Mantle Street,you notice more houses lining the roads on either side.Their front doors open straight onto the pavement.Scattered between these houses are various shops and businesses.These are a Cinema, Wellington Sales & Auction Rooms,a Public House,A Hotel,2 garages,a Milk Factory also further down is the Roman Catholic Church,a Youth Centre and Courtfeilds Secondary School set back from the road.Behind the Secondary Schoolis an area devoted to recreation and Education.The Recreation fields are in this area,the Park,Beech Grove Primary School,the Adult Education Centre and the blind home. Back on the main road these shops can be found:Mantle Street Stores,a florists,a D.I.Y. store,Wessex Blinds, Motorbikes,Pet Foods,Fish'n'chips,
